name: Peanut Noodles with Fried Egg
title: Peanut Noodles with Fried Egg
instructions: In a small bowl, mix the peanut butter, soy sauce and sesame oil.
Add water to a large pan and bring to boil. When boiling, add the noodles and cook to package instructions (e.g. 5 minutes).
Heat a frying pan to medium-high heat. About 3 minutes before the noodles are cooked, add a small amount of cooking oil and fry the egg. You want the white part cooked with a runny yolk.

When the noodles are ready, drain the water, then add the peanut/soy/sesame sauce to the noodles in the pan and mix together (alternatively, you can just add the noodles and sauce to the serving bowl directly & mix there).
Lay the fried egg on top of the noodles. Season with salt and pepper
Sprinkle the sliced onion over the egg. Enjoy!
